channel.title: All Registered Polls for the House of Commons
channel.description: All Registered Polls for the House of Commons

item.title: Opinion Poll by Redfield & Wilton Strategies, 12 August 2020 – Voting Intentions
item.description:
• Conservative Party: 41.5–45.9%
  • Labour Party: 34.5–38.7%
  • Liberal Democrats: 7.9–10.5%
  • Scottish National Party: 3.3–5.1%
  • Plaid Cymru: 0.1–0.6%
  • Green Party: 2.5–4.1%

item.title: Opinion Poll by YouGov for The Times, 4–5 August 2020 – Seat Projections for the Parties
item.description:
• Conservative Party: 300–355 seats

  • Liberal Democrats: 1–6 seats
  • Scottish National Party: 53–58 seats
  • Plaid Cymru: 5–7 seats
  • Green Party: 1 seats
  • Brexit Party: 0 seats
